page.title: 12Newent Day 21st Sept. 1985
page.content: This is a list of some the events organised by the {Newent Society}to make residents aware of their town: * A display of old maps and photos showing the history of the Newent area * Walks around the Town to show the architectural features. * A photographic competition with a theme of 'Newent'. * A display of litter collected in the vicinity during the day. * Exhibitions and stalls run by local clubs and societies. * A Natural History Walk with members of the Gloucestershire Trust for Nature Conservancy. * A chance to indicate which building was unsightly (result= Public Toilets) * The evening session was an Any Questions and afterwards poems and folk songs about Newent were enjoyed in the Red Lion Hotel.
